mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feedback (feedback_id, member_account, employee_account, content) VALUES (#{feedbackId}, #{memberAccount}, #{employeeAccount}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE feedback SET member_account = #{memberAccount}, employee_account = #{employeeAccount}, content = #{content}, WHERE feedback_id = #{feedbackId}
mapper.select: SELECT feedback.feedback_id, feedback.time_created, feedback.employee_account, employee.employee_name, feedback.content FROM feedback INNER JOIN employee ON feedback.employee_account = employee.employee_account WHERE feedback.member_account = #{memberAccount}
